data.text:
BMW ALPINA - A FANTASTIC COMBINATION

ALPINA AUTOMOBILES represents the best refinement of the Bavarian car brand, and KOED is the distributor of their products. ALPINA creates exclusive cars and accessories for a small circle of connoisseurs who appreciate the extraordinary. ALPINAs are probably the most famous individual cars based on BMWs. Currently, KOED does not retail BMW ALPINA cars, but does retail their entire range of BMW parts, accessories and equipment.

ORDER BMW ALPINA AT KOED

It is convenient and easy to order BMW parts and equipment with us. Your order is completed quickly and securely online, and we pack and ship your goods so you receive them the next day **. If you need advice and guidance in connection with your purchase or you have a special request, please contact us here.

REALIZE YOUR DREAMS WITH SOMETHING UNIQUE

We have easy, quick access to all BMW ALPINA goods. Everything ordered is a delivery item, but we can get most orders from ALPINA in just 1-2 days.

BMW ALPINA AUTOMOBILES

ALPINA is a small family business in the south German city of Buchloe, which has existed for more than 50 years - all the while cooperating with BMW in Munich. The close cooperation with BMW is the foundation of ALPINA's ongoing success, and it allows for the creation of unique individual products while meeting the highest quality and safety standards. ALPINA AUTOMOBILES particularly values discreet and exclusive design, sublime craftsmanship and the best customer service. These qualities are the main reasons why BMW works with them, but also the fact that they survived in a challenging market for more than 50 years.

* (only stock items and when ordering Monday-Thursday before 15:00).
